name: Net IDE
tagline: .NET based platform for rapid development of IDE like applications
body:
### Welcome to the Net IDE website ###
Net IDE is a .NET based platform for rapid development of IDE like applications. The design of Net IDE is heavily based on the platform on which Visual Studio is based. In this sense, the Net IDE platform is similar to the [Visual Studio Isolated Shell](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/vstudio/bb685691.aspx).

For more information and documentation, visit the [Net IDE wiki](https://github.com/netide/netide/wiki).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
